item.title: Has Clean Science & Technology Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Clean Science & Technology Ltd has declared a dividend of 200%, amounting to ₹4 per share, with an ex-date of February 6, 2026. However, the company's stock has experienced significant negative returns over various periods, indicating challenging performance despite the dividend. Time: 27 minutes ago

item.title: Has Dr Lal Pathlabs Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Dr Lal Pathlabs Ltd has declared a dividend of 35% (₹7 per share) with an ex-date of February 5, 2026. The company has shown positive total returns over the past 2 to 5 years, despite recent short-term declines. Time: 27 minutes ago

item.title: Has Procter & Gamble Hygiene & Health Care Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Procter & Gamble Hygiene & Health Care Ltd. has declared a dividend of 1700% (₹65 per share) with an ex-date of August 28, 2025. Despite this, the company has experienced negative total returns over the past 1 to 4 years, though it showed a positive return of 12.34% over the last 5 years. Time: 27 minutes ago

item.title: Has MOIL Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, MOIL Ltd. has declared a dividend of 35% (₹1.8 per share) with an ex-date of February 5, 2026. The total returns over various periods show strong performance, particularly with a 5-year total return of 175.34%. Time: 27 minutes ago

item.title: Has Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd has declared a dividend of 1100% (₹5.5 per share), with an ex-date of February 5, 2026. While recent short-term returns have been negative, the company has shown strong growth over longer periods. Time: 27 minutes ago

item.title: Has Procter & Gamble Hygiene & Health Care Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Procter & Gamble Hygiene & Health Care Ltd. has declared a dividend of 1700% (₹65 per share), with an ex-date of February 5, 2026. Despite the significant dividend, total returns have been negative over shorter periods, improving in the long term. Time: 27 minutes ago

item.title: Has Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd has declared a dividend of 32% (₹4.5 per share) with an ex-date of February 9, 2026. While recent total returns have been negative, the company has shown substantial growth over longer periods. Time: 27 minutes ago

item.title: Has Nestle India Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Nestle India Ltd has declared a 700% dividend, with an ex-date of February 6, 2026. The company has shown positive total returns over various periods, particularly strong over the long term. Time: 27 minutes ago

item.title: Has Insecticides India Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Insecticides India Ltd has declared a 20% dividend, amounting to ₹2 per share, with an ex-date of February 6, 2026. While recent total returns have been negative, longer-term performance shows significant growth, particularly a 93.57% total return over the past five years. Time: 27 minutes ago

item.title: Has Triveni Engineering and Industries Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Triveni Engineering and Industries Ltd has declared a dividend of 150% (₹2.5 per share) with an ex-date of February 6, 2026. The company has shown varying total returns, with a notable 5-year total return of 412.98%. Time: 27 minutes ago

item.title: Has National Aluminium Company Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, National Aluminium Company Ltd has declared a 90% dividend, amounting to ₹4 per share, with an ex-date of February 6, 2026. The company has shown strong total returns, with a 5-year total return of 702.84%. Time: 27 minutes ago
